election_record.label: New York 1808 Collector, New York, Ward 8

overview.note: The Public Advertiser (New York, NY), November 15, in its list of Republican candidates, uses the name Adrian Hegeman for Andrew Hegeman.
The New-York Commercial Advertiser (New York, NY) and New-York Spectator (New York, NY) report 348 votes for Benjamin C. Stevenson in Ward 8.
Benjamin C. Stevenson is listed as B. C. Stevenson in some sources.

"Charter Election -- When this paper went to press we had heard nothing of the result of the election but conjecture, except from the 8th ward, where it appears from the official returns that the republican ticket has succeeded by almost double the usual majority. We copy the following from the official return of this solid and harmonious ward." Republican Watch-Tower (New York, NY). November 22, 1808.
